man i know dat skidrow releases r d best but how can a game who's release date is not yet confirmed be upladed acc to http://www.metacritic.com/game/pc/fireburst

Thanks for the upload Azaq but how to change player name? I renamed the default player in the config file and put my name in the launcher but the game still calls me azaq. No offence but I don't want to play as ur name, I want my own.
The setting is probably in C:Users"username"AppDataLocalSKIDROW but which subfolder? I have 28 of them and no idea which one. Any help is appreciated.
